title: 12/29/21 DPS Hour 1 Doug Gottlieb & Rob Parker Guest Hosting
itunes:title: 12/29/21 DPS Hour 1 Doug Gottlieb & Rob Parker Guest Hosting
description:
Doug and Rob pay tribute to John Madden on the morning after the death of the legendary coach and broadcaster. Both of the guys think that the thing that people forget most about Madden is the fact that he was a great head football coach. The guys talk about the new Covid protocols for the NFL and how that will impact teams. Former Jets and Browns head coach Eric Mangini joins Doug and Rob to talk about John Madden from the perspective of a head coach, and to discuss the major headlines going into week 17 of the NFL season. Plus, Rob and Doug break down the Bills chances coming out of the AFC.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
